message: This product is a 'tester' product, and I'm offering it to you at a discounted price of $100000. It's a great opportunity to try out our product line and see if you like it.

I'm willing to take a chance on this high-quality product at the discounted price.

However, I'll throw in a bonus: if you buy this product, I'll give you a 10% discount on the next product you purchase from me, regardless of its quality. This is the lowest price I've ever offered on a high-quality product, and it's only available to you because of your loyalty and trust in our company. What do you say?
